title: The Haunting
description: Scott and Rebecca’s greatest enemy, the Ascension Lady, has come to Becka for help.She wants to hold a séance to free the spirit of a little girl who has been haunting an old mansion in town. After a series of eerie experiences, Becka and Scott begin to wonder if it really is a ghost haunting the old mansion in town…or demons.Follow Rebecca and Scott as they find themselves caught up in their most dangerous encounter yet—an encounter that will take a miracle to bring them through safely.
author: Bill Myers
